verses.roman:
āra dina mahāprabhu bhaṭṭācārya-sane
ānande karilā jagannātha daraśane

synonyms: āra dina—the next day; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhaṭṭācārya-sane—along with Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; ānande—in great pleasure; karilā—did; jagannātha—to Lord Jagannātha; daraśane—visit.
translation: The next morning, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya together visited the temple of Lord Jagannātha. Both of them were in a very pleasant mood.
